title: Imagination
additional-note: While there is no renewal specifically filed for 'Technical Slip', which appears in the December 1950 issue, it may be covered by the 1976 renewal for the Spring 1949 issue of The Arkham Sampler, in which the story first appeared.  The first renewal for a contribution that specifically mentions this magazine is for 'Shadow, Shadow, on the Wall' in the February 1951 issue.
